info.description:
# Introduction
The Slothpixel API provides Hypixel related data.

Currently the API has a rate limit of **60 requests/minute** and **50,000 requests per month**. If you have higher data needs contact the admins on discord.

Consider supporting The Slothpixel Project on Patreon to help cover the hosting costs.

[Discord](https://discord.gg/ND9bJKK) | [Patreon](https://patreon.com/slothpixel)

# GraphQL
    Slothpixel API supports the use of GraphQL query language, and it is recommended for advanced users. [Read more](https://github.com/slothpixel/core/wiki/GraphQL)
info.title: Slothpixel API

key.name: key
key.description:
Use an API key to remove monthly call limits and to receive higher rate limits.

      Usage example: https://api.slothpixel.me/api/players/slothpixel?key=YOUR-API-KEY

      API key can also be sent using the authorization header "Authorization: Bearer YOUR-API-KEY"

get.summary: Get player stats by name or uuid
get.description: Returns player stats of one or up to 16 players. Multiple `playerName`s must be separated by a comma.

parameters.name: playerName
parameters.description: Username or non-dashed UUID of player. UUID should be used when feasible for better performance.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: A comma separated list of fields to include alongside basic stats.

level.description: Player level with precision of two decimals

total_games_played.description: Total games played across all minigames

mc_version.description: Minecraft version the user last logged on Hypixel with

gifts_sent.description: Total gifts sent to other players

gifts_received.description: Total gifts received from other players

ranks_sent.description: Total ranks sent to other players

is_contributor.description: Whether player is a contributor to Slothpixel

DISCORD.description: Discord handle, in full format of username#discriminator

parameters.name: playerName

points_tiered.description: Total achievement points from tiered achievements in the game

points_one_time.description: Total achievement points from one time achievements in the game

points_legacy.description: Total achievement points from legacy achievements in the game

parameters.name: playerName
parameters.description: Username or non-dashed UUID of player. UUID should be used when feasible for better performance.

get.summary: Get list of player's skyblock profiles
get.description: Gets all skyblock profiles for the specified player

parameters.name: playerName
parameters.description: Username or non-dashed UUID of player. UUID should be used when feasible for better performance.

get.description: If no profile is specified, the last played profile is returned

parameters.name: playerName
parameters.description: Username or non-dashed UUID of player. UUID should be used when feasible for better performance.

parameters.name: profileId
parameters.description: SkyBlock profile id e.g. '498228a732d443589aabd1e97e6806cd' or profile name e.g. 'Mango'. Note: profile name can be different (although unlikely) for different members of a co-op!

inventory.description: Array of item objects. Empty slots are empty objects.

armor.description: Array of item objects. Empty slots are empty objects.

talisman_bag.description: Array of item objects. Empty slots are empty objects.

fishing_bag.description: Array of item objects. Empty slots are empty objects.

potion_bag.description: Array of item objects. Empty slots are empty objects.

ender_chest.description: Array of item objects. Empty slots are empty objects.

candy_bag.description: Array of item objects. Empty slots are empty objects.

wardrobe.description: Array of item objects. Empty slots are empty objects.

get.description: Allows you to query active auctions and filter the results based on things such as item ID, rarity, bin or category.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit number of records returned. Largest allowed value is 1000.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Pages allow you to split the data using the `limit` param. For example, if there are 23 auctions matching your query and you set the limit to 10, each page will return up to the next 10 consecutive results. With 23 results, you would expect pages 0 and 1 to each have 20 results and page 2 to have the remaining 3.

parameters.name: auctionUUID
parameters.description: Auction uuid, e.g. "7314f4f14c324342933e6c8c46a600be"

parameters.name: sortOrder
parameters.description: Define sort order. `asc` for ascending or `desc` for descending

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Which field to sort records by. Choosing to sort by a custom field may lead to slow queries.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Item id, e.g. NEW_YEAR_CAKE. All available item ids can be found on the [items endpoint](https://api.slothpixel.me/api/skyblock/items).

parameters.name: bin
parameters.description: When `true`, returns only bin auctions and when `false`, returns only normal auctions. Both types are returned if the parameter is not specified.

parameters.name: rarity
parameters.description: Filter by item rarity

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Filter by item category

start.description: UNIX timestamp of auction start date

end.description: UNIX timestamp of auction end date

lore.description: Array of strings containing item's lore with formatting

count.description: How many items are for sale in the auction

enchantments.description: Object containing item's enchantments in type:level format e.g. sharpness: 5.

uuid.description: Item's unique uuid if it has one. Can be used to track previous auctions of the same item

texture.description: If the item is a minecraft skull, i.e. a talisman, this property contains the texture id. Textures can be found at http://textures.minecraft.net/texture/{id}

get.description: Returns all SkyBlock items

texture.description: If the item is a minecraft skull, i.e. a talisman, this property contains the texture id. Textures can be found at http://textures.minecraft.net/texture/{id}

bazaar.description: Set to true if the item can be found in the bazaar

get.summary: Get bazaar data for an item or for all items
get.description: Get bazaar data for an item by ID, or for all items. You can see which items are available in the bazaar via the `/skyblock/items` endpoint. If none is specified returns all items.

parameters.name: itemId
parameters.description: Item id, e.g. HOT_POTATO_BOOK. All available item ids can be found on the [items endpoint](https://api.slothpixel.me/api/skyblock/items). Multiple can be specified by seperating them with commas. To get all the items, don't specify itemId.

get.description: Returns SkyBlock events. Use key for the events parameter in /calendar/events endpoint

EVENT_ENUM.description: The cleaner name of the event. Use key for the events parameter in /calendar/events endpoint

get.description: Returns information about the SkyBlock calendar

parameters.name: events
parameters.description: The specific events you want to view the times. If left blank, will return all events. Multiple events separated by commas.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Date from which to get events. Uses a Unix timestamp with milliseconds or a [custom date string](https://github.com/slothpixel/core/wiki/Using-custom-date-parameters). E.g. to get past 24 hours, use `now-1d`.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Date to get calendar events until to. Uses a Unix timestamp with milliseconds or a [custom date string](https://github.com/slothpixel/core/wiki/Using-custom-date-parameters). E.g. to reference the date 3 hours ago, use `now-3h`.

parameters.name: years
parameters.description: The amount of Skyblock years to query.

parameters.name: stopatyearend
parameters.description: Whether to stop the data at the year end. If true, will only show data until the end of the current Skyblock year, otherwise will return the full year starting from the 'from' timestamp, possibly including part of the next year.

date.description: The date based on 'from' parameter, e.g Early Winter 14th

day.description: The current day based on 'from' parameter

month.description: The current month based on 'from' parameter

year.description: The current year based on 'from' parameter

time.description: The current time based on 'from' parameter

minute.description: The current minute based on 'from' parameter

hour.description: The current hour based on 'from' parameter

next_day_countdown.description: The time until the next day based on 'from' parameter

next_month_countdown.description: The time until the next month based on 'from' parameter

next_year_countdown.description: The time until the next year based on 'from' parameter

name.description: The cleaner name of the event

duration.description: The time the event is active

start_timestamp.description: The starting timestamp of the event

end_timestamp.description: The ending timestamp of the event

starting_in.description: The time until the event starts

ending_in.description: The time until the event ends

pet.description: The type of pet if the event is a Traveling Zoo

get.description: Returns a list of boosters for all server gamemodes

active.description: Whether the booster is currently active

stacked.description: Array of players that have stacked a booster on the same slot

get.summary: Get boosters for a specified game
get.description: Returns a list of active boosters for the specified game

parameters.name: game
parameters.description: [Standard](https://github.com/slothpixel/core/wiki/Standard-naming) minigame name

active.description: Whether the booster is currently active

stacked.description: Array of players that have stacked a booster on the same slot

get.description: Returns information about the number of staff and watchdog server bans

last_minute.description: Watchdog's bans in the last minute

daily.description: Watchdog bans in the last day
Staff bans in the last day

get.description: Returns information about player counts in each game
Get static game data mirrored from the hypixelconstants repository. If no resource is specified, returns an array of available resources.

parameters.name: resource
parameters.description: Resource name e.g. `languages`. [List of resources](https://github.com/slothpixel/hypixelconstants/tree/master/build)
